import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import styled from 'styled-components'; import {motion} from 'framer-motion'; import {ItemInput, StyledReactLink} from '../itemsStyles' const Item = ({match}) => { console.log(match.params.id) const itemId=match.params.id const [item, setItem]=useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) const fetchData=async ()=>{ const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/products/${itemId}`) const data=await response.json() setItem(data) } return ( <>
↩back

{item.title}

{item.price}kr
Stock: {item.stock}
Category: {item.category}

Description: {item.description}

) } export default Item
